item.title: Insert Shortcodes in Deuts Log
item.description: Details on how to insert shortcodes in deuts.org
item.content:encoded:
Insert a Youtube Video

{{< youtube youtubeID >}}

Insert a Hugo Shortcode

{{< insertcode "file.txt" >}}

You may use the folder/file.txt, and they should be located in the assets directory of your Hugo site.

Add Comments in Markdown Files

{{% comment %}} TODO: rewrite the paragraph below. {{% /comment %}}
Documentation: Shortcodes#comment

Insert Reference to another post

[Post 1]({{% ref "/posts/blood-vs-name/" %}})

Result: Post 1

Insert a linkcard

{{< linkcard 
  url="https://link-to-article.com/" 
  title="Insert title here" 
  description="Insert description here."
>}}

Insert callouts

{{< callout type="info" title="Information" >}}
This is an informational callout with default styling.
{{< /callout >}}
{{< callout type="success" title="Success" >}}
Tell me more about your success story.
{{< /callout >}}

{{< /callout >}}
{{< callout type="warning" title="Caution" >}}
You have been warned!
{{< /callout >}}
{{< callout type="nothing" title="Nothing" >}}
This is nothing!
{{< /callout >}}

Insert an applink

{{< applink "Picsur" >}}

item.title: Create a new post in Deuts Log
item.description: Details on how to create new posts in deuts.org
item.content:encoded:
Create folder and index.md file

  • Create a new folder in content/posts
  • Under the newly created folder, create an index.md file

Enter the Frontmatter

---
title: Draft Title for Staging # edit this as may be necessary
date: 2024-11-15T10:42:54+08:00 # edit this as may be necessary
tags:
  - github # add your tags here
summary: 
description: 
slug: staging-draft # edit this as may be necessary
ShowToc: false
TocOpen: false
draft: true
---

Enter your content

You know what to do here.

Check the post in staging

  • In the terminal:
cd /home/deuts/deutslog/site
hugo -e staging
  • Check the new post at Deuts Log Staging
  • When you’re satisfied, you’re ready to move to the next step

Publish your post

  • Edit the frontmatter, set draft: false
  • In the terminal, run:
cd /home/deuts/deutslog/site
hugo
git add .
git commit -m "new post"
git push
  • Wait for the pages to deploy to Github, then check the post at Deuts Log
